attributes.action: Introduce a Ceiling for the UK Population
attributes.additional_details: Having first carried out a study into what population the UK landmass can support; then taken into account the impact of the rapidly increasing cost of fossil fuels used as fuels for transporting imported foodstuffs, establish a target population for the UK commensurate with the findings of this research and then introduce immigration controls to achieve it.  If need be, revoke those EU treaties that undermine the sovereignty of the British people and their government from achieving this.
